title: The Loneliness of Frank
story: Frank is not an old man. He is only 61 years old. But he is dying. He is in the home for old people. Nobody visits him. His wife doesn't visit him. She is already dead. She died six months ago. She died in the street. She was crossing the street. A car ran over her. Frank loves his wife. He got sick after she died. He never got better. The doctor says that nothing is wrong with Frank's body. The doctor says that Frank wants to die. The doctor is right. Frank does not want to live without his wife.
summary: A heartbreaking tale of Frank, a 61-year-old man who is dying in a home for the elderly after losing his beloved wife.
image: An empty chair next to a window, symbolizing the loneliness and absence felt by Frank in his final days.
